comment: A pleasure to host. Communicated well, warm and friendly, kept the place in great shape! We would welcome Cindi back anytime!
She was friendly, easy to communicate with, and respectful of our house rules. I would happily host her again!
The place was very clean, modern, had everything we needed to feel at home, and was an easy walk to all the sites we wanted to see.
We did not get to meet her in person, but she was quick to communicate and left our place clean.
A good bed and nice bathroom. She is a great host and there when you need him, Very nice and wants to share all hé know about the area. We had a great stay!
Both very attractive and fun to be with. Lexi, actually, is beautiful. Energy unlimited. We hope that they come back again. They were terrific!
Communicated well, was very tidy and respectful of our place. Happy to host anytime!

Nicely renovated in a cool neighborhood close to metro and lots of transit. Comfortable bed and well prepared small kitchen – I appreciated the coffee and tea. Host was super responsive and it was all great. I’d stay again.
The space was absolutely what was promised. The bed was super comfy and clean.
We loved our stay! We felt very comfortable, safe, and it was very clean. The location was great, too.
The apartment is beautifully furnished with particular attention to all the details for the best comfort.
He was very accommodating, helpful and friendly. He gave us some superb recommendations on where to eat, places to shop and sights to see.
The apartment was clean, comfortable, and in a great location. He communicates quickly and is very accommodating. Thanks again!

He is kind, prompt and helped us with every aspect of our reservation and stay. His place is clean, well designed and spacious. There are many great coffee shops, restaurants and shops in walking distance and the neighborhood itself is great!
Every little detail is perfectly thought out and the space couldn’t be more perfect.
The apartment is beautiful, and very much lives up to the photos. If you’re looking for a quiet place away from all the hubbub and tourists to relax, then this is your place!
Lovely apartment, really homely feel and beautiful touches.
Great and beautifully designed apartment! Strongly recommended for backpack traveller, it is your ultimate place to look for! Not so much for those who travel with luggages.
A treat to stay in this lovely apartment, the way the light fell into the space, the environmental design and architecture – all of it is impressive.
A little way out of the city but accessible and a lovely neighbourhood. I will return as often as I can and will be sure to advise friends about this gem.
Stylish beyond belief. Great location with restaurants, stores and and shops close by. A great seating area outside to enjoy a drink. Highly recommended!
Stunning home, has everything you will need, amazing hosts and a lot of privacy.
Safe, friendly place near a most beautiful church and plenty of restaurants and cafes.
This apartment was located in an incredible part of town. I was literally walking distance to everything. It was just as pictured, very clean, and very private.
I really enjoyed my stay here and think it’s a great way to enjoy Manila from the comfort of a place that feels like home.
